title: An Extraordinary Girl is Trying Her Best to Ruin My Daily Life - Novel Updates

description: The unexpected death of Xingzhi caused his soul to be put into a Japanese senior high school student. Just when he was determined to study hard and be admitted to a well-known university to live a simple life, the famous beautiful girl in the school unexpectedly confessed to him.>
